document.full_text: syrian security forces killed three protesters in the southern city of deraa on friday, residents said, in the most violent response to protests against syria's ruling elite since revolts swept through the arab world.
document.title: syrian forces kill three protesters in southern city
lines_and_colors: syrian security forces killed three protesters in the southern city of deraa on friday, residents said, in the most violent response to protests against syria's ruling elite since revolts swept through the arab world.
